page.title: 05Education.
page.content: There are six Primary Schools in the grid.Their names and the names of their headmasters are as follows:- Bryn Deri-Mr K.Innes; Radyr-Mr A.Evans Tongwynlais-Mr A.Bowen; Coryton-Mr.I. Broad; Rhiwbina- Mr.D.Lewis;Eglwys Newydd-Mr.A.Williams. Coryton and Bryn Deri are modern open plan schools built in the mid 70's. The others are traditional schools built around the 1900's. There are two Comprehensive schools in our area.They are Radyr Comprehensive and Whitchurch Comprehensive Schools. Whitchurch School has about 2000 pupils which makes it the biggest comprehensive in Wales.
